description: a task run. Machine learning task runs are asynchronous tasks that Glue runs on your behalf as part of various machine learning workflows. You can cancel a machine learning task run at any time by calling CancelMLTaskRun with a task run's parent transform's TransformID and the task run's TaskRunId.

parameters.name: TransformId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the machine learning transform.

parameters.name: TaskRunId
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the task run.

nested_items.name: TransformId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the machine learning transform.

nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the task run.
